Package be.uantwerpen.fti.ei.Game.Entities

Class AbstractPlayer

java.lang.Object
be.uantwerpen.fti.ei.Game.Entities.AbstractFigure
be.uantwerpen.fti.ei.Game.Entities.AbstractPlayer
Direct Known Subclasses:
J2DPlayer, PlayerCUBE
public abstract class AbstractPlayer extends AbstractFigure
Represents an abstract player in the game. The player is a type of figure with additional properties and behaviors specific to players.
Author:
Ahmad Shakleya

  • Constructor Details

    • AbstractPlayer

      public AbstractPlayer(int x, int y, int dx, int dy, int traagheid, int hitboxWidth, int hitboxHeight, int healthValue, int HighScore, int screenWidth, int screenHeight, int size, int level, String soundFile)
      Constructs an AbstractPlayer object.
      Parameters:
      x - The x-coordinate of the player's position.
      y - The y-coordinate of the player's position.
      dx - The initial x velocity of the player.
      dy - The initial y velocity of the player.
      traagheid - The traagheid value of the player.
      hitboxWidth - The width of the player's hitbox.
      hitboxHeight - The height of the player's hitbox.
      healthValue - The initial health value of the player.
      HighScore - The high score value of the player.
      screenWidth - The width of the game screen.
      screenHeight - The height of the game screen.
      size - The size of the player.
      level - The level of the player.
      soundFile - The sound file associated with the player.

    • draw

      public abstract void draw()
      Draws the player. This method should be implemented in the concrete player classes.
